<p>每个 API 都附 <strong>浏览器支持率</strong> + <strong>30 秒上手代码</strong> + <strong>真实业务场景</strong>，复制即用，今晚下班早！</p>

<h2 data-id="heading-0">1 Page Visibility API —— 页面“隐身”探测</h2>
<p><strong>支持率：</strong> 97%（Chrome 13+、Edge 12+）<br>
<strong>场景：</strong> 用户切标签页时暂停视频、停止轮询</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-variable language_">document</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">addEventListener</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'visibilitychange'</span>, <span class="hljs-function">() =&gt;</span> {
  <span class="hljs-variable language_">document</span>.<span class="hljs-property">visibilityState</span> === <span class="hljs-string">'hidden'</span>
    ? video.<span class="hljs-title function_">pause</span>()
    : video.<span class="hljs-title function_">play</span>();
});
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">2 Web Share API —— 一键唤起系统分享</h2>
<p><strong>支持率：</strong> 92%（需 HTTPS）<br>
<strong>场景：</strong> 把当前文章内容分享到微信、微博</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (navigator.<span class="hljs-property">share</span>) {
  navigator.<span class="hljs-title function_">share</span>({
    <span class="hljs-attr">title</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'我的新文章'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">text</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'快来看看'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">url</span>: location.<span class="hljs-property">href</span>,
  });
}
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">3 Broadcast Channel —— 跨标签页通信</h2>
<p><strong>支持率：</strong> 94%（Chrome 54+）<br>
<strong>场景：</strong> A 标签页登录，B 标签页自动刷新</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> bc = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">BroadcastChannel</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'login'</span>);
bc.<span class="hljs-title function_">postMessage</span>({ <span class="hljs-attr">token</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'abc123'</span> });
bc.<span class="hljs-property">onmessage</span> = <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">e</span>) =&gt;</span> <span class="hljs-variable language_">console</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">log</span>(e.<span class="hljs-property">data</span>);
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">4 Intl.NumberFormat —— 一键千分位</h2>
<p><strong>支持率：</strong> 100%<br>
<strong>场景：</strong> 价格、股票、报表格式化</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">Intl</span>.<span class="hljs-title class_">NumberFormat</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'zh-CN'</span>).<span class="hljs-title function_">format</span>(<span class="hljs-number">1234567</span>); <span class="hljs-comment">// 1,234,567</span>
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">5 IntersectionObserver —— 懒加载 + 曝光埋点</h2>
<p><strong>支持率：</strong> 97%（Chrome 51+）<br>
<strong>场景：</strong> 图片懒加载、广告曝光统计</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> io = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">IntersectionObserver</span>(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">entries</span>) =&gt;</span> {
  entries.<span class="hljs-title function_">forEach</span>(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">e</span>) =&gt;</span> e.<span class="hljs-property">isIntersecting</span> &amp;&amp; <span class="hljs-title function_">loadImg</span>(e.<span class="hljs-property">target</span>));
});
io.<span class="hljs-title function_">observe</span>(img);
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2 data-id="heading-5">6 ResizeObserver —— 元素级尺寸监听</h2>
<p><strong>支持率：</strong> 94%（Chrome 64+）<br>
<strong>场景：</strong> 响应式图表、虚拟滚动</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> ro = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">ResizeObserver</span>(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">entries</span>) =&gt;</span> {
  entries.<span class="hljs-title function_">forEach</span>(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">e</span>) =&gt;</span> <span class="hljs-variable language_">console</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">log</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'尺寸变化'</span>, e.<span class="hljs-property">contentRect</span>));
});
ro.<span class="hljs-title function_">observe</span>(chartContainer);
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2 data-id="heading-6">7 Clipboard API —— 无依赖复制</h2>
<p><strong>支持率：</strong> 95%（需 HTTPS）<br>
<strong>场景：</strong> 一键复制邀请码、优惠券码</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> navigator.<span class="hljs-property">clipboard</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">writeText</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'COUPON2025'</span>);
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2 data-id="heading-7">8 URLSearchParams —— 再也不用正则解析 query</h2>
<p><strong>支持率：</strong> 100%<br>
<strong>场景：</strong> 路由、埋点、搜索参数</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> params = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">URLSearchParams</span>(location.<span class="hljs-property">search</span>);
params.<span class="hljs-title function_">get</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'id'</span>); <span class="hljs-comment">// ?id=123</span>
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2 data-id="heading-8">9 AbortController —— 可取消的 fetch</h2>
<p><strong>支持率：</strong> 100%<br>
<strong>场景：</strong> 取消过期请求、防抖动</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> controller = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">AbortController</span>();
<span class="hljs-title function_">fetch</span>(url, { <span class="hljs-attr">signal</span>: controller.<span class="hljs-property">signal</span> });
controller.<span class="hljs-title function_">abort</span>(); <span class="hljs-comment">// 立即中断</span>
</code></pre>
